title: Zephyr Horizon Range Hood
description:
A dramatic, low-profile freefall just inches from the kitchen wall sweeps upward in a thirty-degree lift. So begins Robert Brunner's new-minimalist range hood, in striking red, black or white glass on stainless steel. The glass surface may be etched in one of our patterns - a leaf motif on white glass, or flowers on black glass. The removable front panel doubles as easy blower access for cleaning or service with no heavy lifting. A duo of halogen lamps completes the picture.

Learn more at http://zephyronline.com/products/arc/horizon_wall
